summary: Meme activity rebounding after H2 2025 contraction. Pump.fun hitting 39K daily deploys (11-month high). Penguin meta dominating, AI agents still strong, platform tokens recovering.

hotNarratives.name: Penguin Meta
hotNarratives.description: Multiple penguin tokens exploding. $PENGUIN surged 600% after White House viral meme (Trump + penguin in Greenland). Toly changed profile pic to penguin, boosting sentiment. Nietzschean Penguin also gaining traction.
hotNarratives.catalyst: Viral White House meme + Solana co-founder profile pic change

hotNarratives.name: AI Agents
hotNarratives.description: AI compute narrative remains intact despite cooling. Tokenfed revolutionizing meme token creation on Solana. $AMELIAJAK (Amelia AI persona) gaining attention. DeepSnitch AI in presale.
hotNarratives.catalyst: Continued AI hype, autonomous agent narratives

hotNarratives.name: Platform Tokens
hotNarratives.description: Pump.fun's $PUMP token recovering hard - up 80% since December. Legal scrutiny hasn't killed momentum. $3M Pump Fund launched for early-stage projects.
hotNarratives.catalyst: Platform revival, new features, fund launch

hotNarratives.name: NFT-to-Memecoin Pivots
hotNarratives.description: Moonbirds launched BIRB token on Solana, FDV approaching $300M. Established NFT projects tokenizing.

emergingThemes.name: Buttcoin
emergingThemes.note: 103% jump in 24 hours. Crude humor narrative.

emergingThemes.name: HACHI
emergingThemes.note: Solana-based with active community traction. Being analyzed for 2026 predictions.

emergingThemes.name: USOR
emergingThemes.note: Fair launch, no obvious team dumps, but bold claims lack substance. Entertainment-grade.

volumePatterns.note: Capital flowing back into Solana memecoins after quiet period

macroContext.solanaShift: Moving from pure meme coin powerhouse toward derivatives + RWA tokenization
macroContext.ondoLaunch: Ondo Global Markets launched Jan 21, 2026 - 200+ tokenized US equities on Solana
macroContext.institutionalAdoption: WisdomTree expanding to Solana, stablecoin adoption surging
macroContext.warning: 2025 report found nearly all Pump.fun tokens exhibited pump-and-dump characteristics

actionableInsights: Penguin meta is hot RIGHT NOW - watch for derivatives and variations
AI agent tokens still have legs but cooling - look for unique angles
Platform tokens ($PUMP) recovering - ecosystem plays showing strength
RWA narrative growing on Solana - memecoin crossovers possible
39K daily deploys = high noise - need sharp filters for signal
